title: Podcast - Think digital, act human: why are communities of practice good for organisations?

content.text: Here is the third episode of our 'Think digital, act human' podcast series which shines a light on the stories of the people behind our digital and technology projects.
In this episode our host, Adaobi Ifeachor, gets to know Jen Staves, Head of Content design.
You’ll hear about content design, co-design, why communities of practice are important for delivery teams, and Jen's role in this space.
Listen and let us know what you think.
If you’re short on time, you can fast forward to:
